publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3672 Chris Ballance: CIA Rendition Flights—That the Parliament considers that there are sufficient grounds to justify a full police inquiry into the possible use of Scottish airports by CIA rendition flights; believes that the Lord Advocate should instruct the police to instigate that inquiry without delay, and further believes that he should instruct the police to conduct searches of planes landing at Scottish airports suspected of being operated by the CIA to ensure that no one aboard is being tortured, being transported in an inhumane manner or being illegally detained against their will. Supported by: Rob Gibson*, Alex Neil*, Fiona Hyslop*, Christine Grahame*, Carolyn Leckie*, Ms Sandra White*, Mark Ballard*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Mr John Swinney*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Patrick Harvie*, Eleanor Scott*, Tommy Sheridan*, Rosie Kane*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S2M-3672 CIA Rendition Flights (lodged on 6 December 2005) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Shiona Baird*, Robin Harper*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3672 CIA Rendition Flights (lodged on 6 December 2005) Dennis Canavan*

S2M-3672 Chris Ballance: CIA Rendition Flights—That the Parliament considers that there are sufficient grounds to justify a full police inquiry into the possible use of Scottish airports by CIA rendition flights; believes that the Lord Advocate should instruct the police to instigate that inquiry without delay, and further believes that he should instruct the police to conduct searches of planes landing at Scottish airports suspected of being operated by the CIA to ensure that no one aboard is being tortured, being transported in an inhumane manner or being illegally detained against their will. Supported by: Rob Gibson, Alex Neil, Fiona Hyslop, Christine Grahame, Carolyn Leckie, Ms Sandra White, Mark Ballard, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Mark Ruskell, Mr John Swinney, Mr Bruce McFee, Patrick Harvie, Eleanor Scott, Tommy Sheridan, Rosie Kane, Roseanna Cunningham, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Shiona Baird, Robin Harper, Donald Gorrie, Dennis Canavan, Linda Fabiani*
S2M-3672 CIA Rendition Flights (lodged on 6 December 2005) Frances Curran*
S2M-3672 CIA Rendition Flights (lodged on 6 December 2005) Mike Pringle*, Colin Fox*, Mr Adam Ingram*
